mdRecord.dcterms:description: The Intendant of Marine in Le Havre asked whether or not Ruellan and Company had recieved a letter back from Jefferson concerning their previous letter regarding Colonel Silas Talbot's two sons in Brest; Ruellan and Company requests Jefferson's reply; enclose a letter received from Les Trois FrÃ¨res, a ship which just arrived from Boston carrying grain, flour and beef.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1789 April 20, Le Havre, [France], to Th[om]as Jefferson, n.p.
